name: Tic Tac Toe: Tribal War
description:
You play this game as a standard Tic-Tac-Toe game. There are two teams

  • Green Team Tribe
  • Red Team Tribe

Both teams try to win by placing their warrior on the block in the middle of the river.

The one who is able to succeed in placing three of their warrior in a horizontal, vertical or diagonal row will be the winner.
